ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Annotate plots with legends for continuous variables and colour spectra using the base graphics plotting tools.
Annotate plots with legends for continuous variables and colour spectra using the base graphics plotting tools.

name: r-plottools
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.4.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-plottools
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/PlotTools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/PlotTools/PlotTools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1e66fd28f79b966751aa241e98a1a7eb4ebb1ade417f86eac14d79402b1fe58c

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('PlotTools')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('PlotTools')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://ms609.github.io/PlotTools/
  dev_url: https://github.com/ms609/PlotTools/
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Annotate plots with legends for continuous variables and colour spectra using the base graphics plotting tools.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: PlotTools
# Title: Add Continuous Legends to Plots
# Version: 0.1.0
# URL: https://ms609.github.io/PlotTools/, https://github.com/ms609/PlotTools/

# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Language: en-GB
# Depends: R (>= 3.2.0)
